content: knitted vest/slipover in drops wish or 2 strands drops air the piece is worked in stocking stitch with ribbed edges and split in the sides the front and back pieces are worked separately back and forth the sleeve edges and neck are worked in the round to finish pattern no wi-035 yarn group e or c + c **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops wish from garnstudio 300-300-350-350-400-450 g colour 05 beige **or** drops air from garnstudio held double 300-300-350-350-400-450 g colour 55 light beige **needles** drops circular needle size 8 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge ** 11 stitches in width and 15 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm with 1 strand drops wish or 2 strands drops air
